snippet: Accompanying the donation was a message that the Health Ministry would give more attention to hospitals that traditionally serve Christian and Jewish Iranians.
abstract: Government of Iranian Pres Hassan Rouhani makes surprise donation of $400,000 to Dr Sapir Hospital and Charity Center, Tehran's only Jewish hospital; also says it intends to give more attention to hospitals that traditionally serve Christian and Jewish Iranians; move is seen as part of Rouhani's attempt to engage world after years of isolation under Pres Mahmoud Ahmadinejad.

byline.contributor: Isabel Kershner contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Accompanying the donation was a message that the Health Ministry would give more attention to hospitals that traditionally serve Christian and Jewish Iranians.

headline.main: Iran Delivers Surprise, Money, to Jewish Hospital
headline.print_headline: Iran Delivers Surprise, Money, to Jewish Hospital
